channel.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
channel.description:
I try to logon to my server and the client says "No response from server. please try using a different world."
Why?
Try it yourself at [b]lonescape.servegame.com[/b] if you want
I have runserver.bat open too
please reply I'm almost done I'm such a dumbass please save me from mai stupidity

item.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Well can you tell us what you are using? (A 317 server/508?)

Then maybe we can give you a client that we know works for that server.

Read full topic
item.source: Another problem.... I'm almost there though

item.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“Gl Then Gf, post:7, topic:334550”]check to see if ur port is open idiot[/quote] You’re an idiot for calling him an idiot -.-

Check to see if you’re connecting to localhost and see if 43594/555 (whatever your using) is open.

Read full topic

item.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

It could be, yes. When I tried (for some strange reason) to log onto a different server with my client (which is for a 317) I believe I got a similar message from my client.

Read full topic

item.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
item.dc:creator: @Kizbits2000 Kizbits2000
item.description:
@Kizbits2000 wrote:

@durial12

Good call, didn’t think of that. Lol. But I don’t reckon so… If he’s been following guides then he should be fine client wise…
I’d put it down to firewall exceptions/Ports.

Kiz

Read full topic
item.source: Another problem.... I'm almost there though

item.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

If I were to guess, i’d say that the client you’re using doesen’t support your server i.e yor trying to use a 317 client on a 508 server.

Read full topic
item.source: Another problem.... I'm almost there though

item.title: Another problem.... I'm almost there though
item.dc:creator: @Kizbits2000 Kizbits2000
item.description:
@Kizbits2000 wrote:

Any more information? Be detailed what are you using 317/508 etc.

Have you port-Forwarded on your router?
Have you set your firewall setting properly on your Server/PC?
How are you compiling it?
What tutorials did you use?

Post some print screens too if you can.

Thanks

Kiz

Read full topic
